tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The treatment was for my daughter - Teeth alignment ; the stage by state progress during our visits were well explained to the kid to make them understand and realise on why this treatment are done;  also the manner in which the entire process were handled right from day one till now has been very friendly and professional by Dr  Shilpa and her colleagues, I can see a sea change in the alignment of the teeth and the change in the profile... the concept of taking care of the teeth were ingrained in the kid‚Äôs mind during each visit which  has helped in maintaining and retaining the cleanliness at all times.

I recommend the clinic to all the age categories as its more to do with a tinge is personal touch with a professional approach. 

Thank you doctor and the staffs.
reply_text: Thankyou so much Mr .Gopalakrishnan for the kind  , detailed & thoughtful words . It really means a lot to us üôè

review: Right from the beginning Dr Shilpa was highly professional, explained the problem in detail and gave the options of treatment. *** **** ****** ** ****** ************* *** ********* ** *** ******** ** ******* *** ******** There was no ambiguity in her explanation leaving me very satisfied and safe in her hands. I found Dr Shilpa very reasonable in her charging. I am from UK and found Dr Shilpa par excellent, quick to get appointment and highly reasonable in her pricing compared to UK. I will definitely recommend anyone with dental problems to approach Dr Shilpa.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Process was too long & multiple times the temporary fillings came off hindering  working life. If it was once I would have understood but it happened 4 times over the process of treatment. 
In the end one of the tooth chipped & she filed it saying we will redo..however the tooth was never kept ready despite my calling & reminding. So it meant I give measurements again & come multiple times to have the old one removed and this fixed. 
Overall very long process & lack of proper communication. She should be writing detailed notes after every visit so that patients are not left dissatisfied after 6 months of multiple visits to fix an issue

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My visit to Orchard Dental Clinic has been most satisfying and rewarding.  I am very happy with the Chief Dental Surgeon, Dr Shilpa Shashikiran who personally ensured that I was thoroughly explained the entire process of the treatment for my RCT. The treatment was done in a highly professional and skilled manner. The cleanliness and hygiene that is maintained in the clinic is top notch. The staff are extremely courteous and helpful and walk that extra mile to keep you comfortable and happy during the entire process. I would highly recommend Orchards Dental Clinic if you wish to address any dental issues. Thanks you and Kudos to the team!! ):

review:
Visited dr Shilpa for my wisdom tooth extraction 21 April , since I had 2 wisdom tooth‚Äôs to be extracted I was very much panicked coz of my previous wisdom tooth extracted on my lower jaw with other dentist , Dr was recommended by my aunt , despite of the pandemic and not many doctors would even approach to see patients coz of the corona , Shilpa mam treats patients without a second thought that‚Äôs the best part about her . 
And coming to the treatment part I barely experienced any pain a day after the extraction and I also got my other wisdom tooth extracted next day that‚Äôs how good her treatment is . Her entire staff is so friendly and so the mam . I strongly recommend DR Shilpa for any sort of tooth problems she doesn‚Äôt even charge too much like others .
Wish you all the very good luck doctor .
